pageHeader: Alimalie Nulalma

content: The exact conditions under which it grows are a bit mysterious,
but what is known is that it attacts the attention of minor fey.
The fey do not wish to own the flower, however, but simply admire it.
The flower's petals have a strange iridescent colour and are shaped like a hexagon.
At the centre of the flower is a soft material with the appearance of a gem.
The color of the gem varies greatly between individual flowers.
The stem of the Feyflower is mostly straight, with at most one large leaf near the ground.
The length of the stem can grow up to the length of a large hand and the leaf follows suit.
